discussion.author: pi8027
discussion.comment: I also reactivated the ordering notations in `ring_scope` to solve some technical issues.

discussion.author: pi8027
discussion.comment: @CohenCyril The problem of subterm selections in `rewrite` isn't solved yet. If it is acceptable, please merge.

discussion.author: CohenCyril
discussion.comment:
> @CohenCyril The problem of subterm selections in `rewrite` isn't solved yet. If it is acceptable, please merge.

ok, then please use a pattern `[X in X && _]` instead of names.

discussion.author: pi8027
discussion.comment: @CohenCyril I did. The problem appears the above 3 places.

commits.author: pi8027
commits.message: Add a compatibility module for ssrnum and MathComp 1.7.0, reactivate the ordering notations in ring_scope (Num.Syntax), and fix ssrint, rat, and intdiv by using the compatibility module
